mapper.select: select sum(nc_inactivatedVaccine) nc_inactivatedVaccine, sum(nc_inactivatedImmuneAmount) nc_inactivatedImmuneAmount, sum(nc_jointVaccine) nc_jointVaccine, sum(nc_jointImmuneAmount) nc_jointImmuneAmount from animal_disease.b_newcastle where nc_regionCode=#{regionCode} AND nc_date BETWEEN #{beginTime} AND #{endTime}

select t1.Liv_regionCode as nc_regionCode ,t1.Liv_regionName as nc_regionName,t2.* from (select Liv_regionCode,Liv_regionName from animal_disease.b_wlivestockinout GROUP by Liv_regionCode,Liv_regionName ) as t1 LEFT JOIN (select nc_regionCode, sum(nc_inactivatedVaccine) nc_inactivatedVaccine, sum(nc_inactivatedImmuneAmount) nc_inactivatedImmuneAmount, sum(nc_jointVaccine) nc_jointVaccine, sum(nc_jointImmuneAmount) nc_jointImmuneAmount from animal_disease.b_newcastle where nc_date BETWEEN #{beginTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP by nc_regionCode ) as t2 on t1.Liv_regionCode=t2.nc_regionCode ORDER by t1.Liv_regionCode
